summary: This gives a more divine and godly look to Auriel's bow as it should have always been.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75730-0-1498828897.png[/img]


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75730-4-1498828897.png[/img]

[/u]v1.2[u]
[/u]- Lowered the intensity of the glow so that hopefully it can be more viable in first person.
- Added a golden version.
[u]
[/u]v1.1
- The bow can now be seen on the pedestal before picking it up the first time.
- Added light source to the weapon.

v1.0
initial release.
[u][u]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827450.png[/img][/u]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75730-1-1498828897.png[/img]

[/u]When i first saw Auriel's Bow, i was quite disappointed. It reminded me of a basic elven bow. As Serana said: "I expected it to be more shiny." My exact same thoughts.
Hell even the daedric weapon dawnbreaker looks more divine than this.
I like the original design itself but it missed the whole godly look.

So i made it glow white and added a bigger dawnbreaker glow effect and voila.

Now i know that Auriel is proud of me :D

I don't use enbs. i hate enbs. so much. But i respect anyone's decision to use one so tell me enb users how it looks. If it is too bright or shiny, i will make a enb version too and make it less glowy.

If you look closely the images shown, there is a faint black outline that surrounds the weapon. i've been having this glitch in awhile and have searched for a fix but in vain. If anyone has a fix or some info, let me know.

[u]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827450.png[/img][/u]
[u][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75730-3-1498828897.png[/img]

[/u]Dawnguard DLC

[u][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827450.png[/img][/u]
[u][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75730-2-1498828897.png[/img]

[/u]Extract the contents of the file in the Skyrim main folder.

[u][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-2-1498827450.png[/img][/u]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/82297-0-1498828111.jpg[/img]
